scripts.install: cd ./apps/be; go mod download; go mod verify; cd ..
scripts.worker: cd ./apps/be; nodemon -V -e .go,.env -w . -x go run ./cmd/worker --count=1 --race -V --signal SIGTERM; cd ..
scripts.scheduler: cd ./apps/be; nodemon -V -e .go,.env -w . -x go run ./cmd/scheduler --count=1 --race -V --signal SIGTERM; cd ..
